Contact

My name is Joe and I build furniture while my wolf pup watches. I started the business on the side and gradually grew it to a full time adventure. My inspirations are beautiful grain, clean lines, strong joints, and unique angles. If you don't see something that works in your space, give me a shout and we will create the perfect piece.
